__TOC__

Paul has nearly 10 years of Linux experience. He has spent most of that time giving back to the community by helping users as a member of the Ubuntu Beginners Team and through his role as team contact for the Ohio LoCo. Today, Paul will share some of the knowledge that he has acquired, and teach us about trusted software.
